scripts.build: rm -rf release; mkdir -p release/www/play; cp www/* release/www/; cp www/play/* release/www/play/; uglifyjs www/play/utility/fastclick.js www/play/ui/{utility,output,input,file}.js -o release/www/play/ui.js -c --screw-ie8; zip -j release/hugojs.zip release/www/play/*
scripts.compile: cd he; emmake make; emcc -DGCC_UNIX -s ASYNCIFY=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -O3 -o ../www/play/he.js he.o hejs.o heexpr.o hemisc.o heobject.o heparse.o heres.o herun.o heset.o stringfn.o; rm *.o he; cd ..
